# NSAppClipRequestLocationConfirmation

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether an App Clip can confirm the user’s location.

## Discussion

Set the value to `true` to allow your App Clip to confirm the user’s location. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppClip/responding-to-invocations].
title: NSAppClipRequestLocationConfirmation
